description:
For more power and more control. These robust all-mountain pedals are a little wider with a nice low profile, so you get better shoe-to-pedal contact. The retention claws are chunky (in a good way) with adjustable tension for cleat entry and release.

  • Wide platform with low profile improves pedalling power when you're not clipped in
  • Durable double-sided binding mechanism has adjustable tension for entry and release
  • Chromoly spindle is strong and durable with 8mm hex wrench mount
  • Sealed bearing system sheds mud and water
  • Includes SM-SH51 cleats
name: Shimano Deore XT PD-M8120 SPD Pedals
